pkmkdoc.description: PDP, IBM 1401, Nova and other CPUs simulator

locale.resource:
{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf1038\cocoasubrtf250 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 SIMH is a highly portable, multi-system simulator.\ \ SIMH implements simulators for:\ \'95 Data General Nova, Eclipse\ \'95 Digital Equipment Corporation PDP-1, PDP-4, PDP-7, PDP-8, PDP-9, PDP-10, PDP-11, PDP-15, VAX\ \'95 GRI Corporation GRI-909, GRI-99\ \'95 IBM 1401, 1620, 1130, \'a07090/7094, System 3\ \'95 Interdata (Perkin-Elmer) 16b and 32b systems\ \'95 Hewlett-Packard 2114, 2115, 2116, 2100, 21MX, 1000\ \'95 Honeywell H316/H516\ \'95 MITS Altair 8800, with both 8080 and Z80\ \'95 Royal-Mcbee LGP-30, LGP-21\ \'95 Scientific Data Systems SDS 940}
